label: A2BC_oP32_56_2e_e_e-001
title: $\beta$-LiNH$_{2}$ ($Pccn$) Structure
comments: Under pressure LiNH$_{2}$ has at least three phases (Yamawaki, 2014): \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC_tI32_82_2g_ace_g-001}{tetragonal $\alpha$-LiNiH$_{2}$}, or Phase I, the ground state, stable up to 10GPa. \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC_mC32_15_2f_f_f-001}{Monoclinic Phase II}, stable between 10 and 13 GPa. \item $\beta$-LiNH$_{2}$, or Phase III, is stable above 13 GPa.  The structure is very uncertain.  (Yamawaki, 2014) discuss two possible structures: \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC_oP32_56_2e_e_e-001}{orthorhombic space group $Pccn$ \#56} (this structure) and \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC_oI32_45_2c_c_c-001}{body-centered orthorhombic space group $Iba2$ \#45}.
